definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]

sentences.english: A flame AAS method is employed for the determination of lead in a traditional patented medicinal preparation "Xinling Pill".
sentences.chinese: 采用火焰原子吸收光谱法测定中成药心灵丸中的铅。

sentences.english: Traditional Chinese medicines manufactured by Pien Tze Huang to protect the varieties of Chinese medicine country.
sentences.chinese: 公司生产的传统中成药片仔癀，为国家中药保护品种。

sentences.english: Xihuang Pill is a classic anti-cancer Chinese patent medicine.
sentences.chinese: 西黄丸是抗癌中成药中的经典名方。

sentences.english: Calculus bovis has wide use and is an important raw material in Chinese patent medicine.
sentences.chinese: 牛黄用途广泛，是中成药的重要原料。

sentences.english: GC method for the determination of cinnamaldehyde in cassia bark capsules has been developed.
sentences.chinese: 采用气相色谱测定中成药右归胶囊中桂皮醛的含量。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical curative effect of Chinese patent medicine on stable angina.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察中成药治疗稳定性心绞痛的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Additional, observe powder color, the officinal true bogus in can differentiating.
sentences.chinese: 另外，观察药粉颜色，可以分辨中成药的真伪。

sentences.english: The method is also suitable for determination of mercury in other traditional Chinese medicine.
sentences.chinese: 此测定方法适用于各种中成药中微量汞的测定。

sentences.english: Borneol is an effective constituent in lots of active Chinese drugs.
sentences.chinese: 冰片作为常用的中药，是多种中成药的有效成分之一。

sentences.english: Objective To establish the evaluation methods of ready-made Chinese medications on the basis of the tongue-color visual measurement.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立基于舌色视觉计算的中成药疗效评估方法。

definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]
medicine made from a single herb/drug made from a single substance
delivery mechanism of a medicine (e.g. pill, powder etc)
medicine to be taken after being mixed with water (or other liquid)
